features: INCLUDES: 2 Steripod Clip-on Toothbrush Protectors with Peppermint Essential Oils, fits most manual and power toothbrushes
PEPPERMINT SCENTED: Each Steripod toothbrush protector also includes a tablet infused with natural peppermint essential oils which leaves behind a refreshing mint scent

MULTI-PURPOSE: This toothbrush protector slips onto the brush head to provide ample coverage for its bristles, while offering protection from between brushes, its simple clip-on design makes it perfect for travel
A NEW WORLD OF CLEAN: These toothbrush protector caps are made of durable, food-safe plastic and are gluten-free, non-toxic and BPA Free
STAY CONNECTED: Use hashtag #getyourpodon to share images of Steripod Toothbrush Protectors in the wild, or text the number on the back of the package to get a 3-month replacement reminder
body.description: Product Description Toothbrushes serve one purpose--to keep beautiful smiles fresh and clean. One of the most convenient and easiest ways to do this is with the Steripod Clip-on Toothbrush Protector, with peppermint essential oils. This protector cap fits most manual and electric toothbrushes and helps brushes, which is especially important during cold and flu season and while traveling. This one-of-a-kind protector is easy to clip-on and includes a tablet infused with natural peppermint essential oils which leaves behind an energizing mint scent. The protective Steripod's patented design helps keep brushes fresh and clean for up to 3 months, the same amount of time dentists recommend for toothbrush replacement. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling
reviews.reviewText: The stair pod clip on toothbrush protector is an excellent travel accessory. It is small and lightweight, making it easy to pack and carry around. The clip is designed to fit most toothbrushes, keeping them clean and protected from germs and dust. The material is also durable and easy to clean, ensuring that the toothbrush remains hygienic throughout the journey. The design is simple and elegant, and the clip-on feature makes it easy to use and secure. Overall, the stair pod clip on toothbrush protector is a must-have for anyone who travels frequently and cares about maintaining oral hygiene on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and keeps toothbrushes clean and sanitary. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Freshness on the Go!
reviews.reviewText: Tried out the Steripod Toothbrush Protectors, and they're a must-have for anyone who loves a clean brush and a minty-fresh vibe. Two protectors with peppermint essential oils – a game-changer for your toothbrush. The clip-on design is genius, fits most brushes, and is perfect for travel. Yeah, it's a bit pricier, but trust me, it's worth it.In short, if you're upping your toothbrush game, Steripod is the way to go. It's not just a protector; it's a daily fresh boost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed - Wish I had known about this product sooner!
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched over to an electric toothbrush and needed something to cover my brush head. I've only ever used traditional toothbrush "travel" cases. (Generic ones at the Dollar Store or travel bins at Walmart.) Was quite hesitant to purchase these brush covers initially based on the various reviews online. However, upon using them, I'm quite delighted. The mint smell/pouch definitely keeps your brush smelling pleasant and fresh. As long as you clean off your brush and dry it off with a tissue before capping it, it holds up fairly well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The vapors don’t last long
reviews.reviewText: Loved that this was like a butterfly clip toothbrush cover rather than a snap closure since those tend to wear out quickly. I figured the minty vapors wouldn’t last very long and it didn’t go away about a week after being opened and used. It was nice while it lasted but it didn’t do much to the brushing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: These toothbrush covers are great to have on hand for guests or traveling, or just as an extra layer of protection from germs if you feel you need it. We had a house guest who was with us a few nights per week for several months and this was perfect for sharing a bathroom with the rest of the household. Also it's great for travel, it does not take up as much space in your bag as a full length toothbrush holder would. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is really useful
reviews.reviewText: They work really well to keep my toothbrush clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We ho through these like crazy at our house, so it’s a great value and delivered.
